typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Asyndeton
typeDescription.description: Type system for Asyndeton(rhetorical device) annotation

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Polysyndeton
typeDescription.description: This is the type system for polysyndeton rhetorical device

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epithet
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epithet(rhetorical device) annotation

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Hypozeugma
typeDescription.description: Type system for Hypozeugma annotation

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.verbsPassiveVoice
typeDescription.description: A suplimentary type of verb annotations used inside Passive Voice detection Ruta rule

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfConditional
typeDescription.description: Type system for If-conditional sentences

featureDescription.name: Pclause
featureDescription.description: Conditional(P) clause in a sentence (i.e. If P, then Q).

featureDescription.name: Qclause
featureDescription.description: Head(Q) clause in a sentence (If P, then Q)

featureDescription.name: Rclause
featureDescription.description: Remaining part of the conditional sentence after extracting the P and Q clauses.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Pclause
typeDescription.description: The conditional clause of the If conditional sentence

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Qclause
typeDescription.description: The head clause of the conditional sentence

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfCondZero
typeDescription.description: Type system for If-conditional of type 0(zero).

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfCondOne
typeDescription.description: Type system for If-conditional of type 1

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfCondTwo
typeDescription.description: Type system for If-conditional of type 2

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfCondThree
typeDescription.description: Type system for If-conditional of type 3

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.ZeugmaConstituents
typeDescription.description: Type system for zeugma constituents(subject-governor pairs)

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epizeugma
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epizeugma rhetorical device

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Governors
typeDescription.description: Type system for sentence Governors identified by Stanford Dependency Parser (in nsubj, nsubjpass, csubj and csubjpass relations)

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.verbsEpizeugma
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epizeugma helping verbs used in Epizeugma Ruta Rule

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.comparativeAdj
typeDescription.description: Type systems for comparative Adjectives

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.superlativeAdj
typeDescription.description: Type system for superlative Adjectives

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.WhetherConditional
typeDescription.description: Type system for whether...or conditional sentences.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.UnlessConditional
typeDescription.description: Type system for Unless conditional sentences

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.ClauseSegment
typeDescription.description: Type system for clause annotations in a sentence

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Chunks
typeDescription.description: Type system for sentence chunks generated by OpenNLP

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.comparativeAdv
typeDescription.description: Type system for comparative Adverbs.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.superlativeAdv
typeDescription.description: Type system for superlative Adverbs.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.IfCounterfactual
typeDescription.description: Type system for counterfactuals with if

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.TripleEnumeration
typeDescription.description: Type system for triple enumeration, i.e. I like pickles, bacon and ketchup.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Pysma
typeDescription.description: Type system for Pysma rhetorical device.

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epanalepsis
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epanalepsis annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Mesarchia
typeDescription.description: Type system for Mesarchia annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epiphoza
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epiphoza annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epadiplosis
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epadiplosis annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Mesoteleuton
typeDescription.description: Type system for Mesoteleuton annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Diacope
typeDescription.description: Type system for Diacope annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Epizeuxis
typeDescription.description: Type system for Epizeuxis annotations

typeDescription.name: type.rhetoricDetection.Bicolon
typeDescription.description: Type system for Bicolon annotations (subtype of Isocolon)

typeDescription.description: Type system for Tricolon annotation (subtype of Isocolon)

typeDescription.description: Type system for Tetracolon annotations (subtype of Isocolon)

typeDescription.description: Type system for Ploche annotations
